Title: I'm Not There
Writer: Todd Haynes (screenplay), Oren Moverman (screenplay), Todd Haynes (story)
Actors: Cate Blanchett, Ben Whishaw, Christian Bale, Richard Gere
Plot: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 28 wins & 48 nominations.
Production: VIP 4 Medienfonds, Endgame Entertainment, John Wells Productions, Killer Films
